title: Captive Films: Season 2
description: In reality TV form, this series follows the lives and loves of those who work at Captive Films.   Hot, successful, playboy Riley Johnson, whose business success far exceeds his success in love. Movie star, Keatyn Douglas, whose epic love story has spawned a series of books and movies.  And Dawson Johnson, who joins Captive with a tragic past. Expect lots of drama, sex, and tabloid-worthy events.  Fans of the USA TODAY bestselling series, The Keatyn Chronicles, will love reconnecting with their favorite characters as adults. This series is meant for readers 18+.
author: Jillian Dodd
